HelpCommand.Title: Help Weather
HelpCommand.Description: This is a help command for weather
HelpCommand.Help: `$weather help` This is a help command for the weather command.
HelpCommand.Current: `$weather current` This command will get the current weather.
HelpCommand.Day: `$weather day` The forecast for today hourly
HelpCommand.Week: `$weather week` The forecast for the next 7 days.

CurrentWeatherCommand.Title: Curent weather
CurrentWeatherCommand.Description: The current weather for %city% is %description% and it feels like %feels_like% %unit%.

SettingsWeatherCommand.Title: Settings update
SettingsWeatherCommand.Description: Please react with :white_check_mark: to confirm the following changes
